EditEventFragment - Class in com.example.eventapp.ui.events
EditEventFragment is a BottomSheetDialogFragment that provides an interface for users to edit an existing event's details, such as name, description, duration, registration deadline, geolocation requirements, max entrants, and poster image.

EventRepository - Class in com.example.eventapp.repositories
The `EventRepository` class is a singleton repository that provides access to Firestore operations for managing `Event` data, including adding, updating, retrieving, and removing event records.
